title: Defunct features
data:
Over the years, NetHack has added many features, but also removed some. These **defunct features** are listed below.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 List of defunct monsters](#List_of_defunct_monsters)

- [2 List of defunct objects](#List_of_defunct_objects)

- [3 Other defunct features](#Other_defunct_features)

- [4 Variants](#Variants)

  - [4.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [4.2 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [4.3 SLASHTHEM](#SLASHTHEM)

- [5 See also](#See_also)

## List of defunct monsters

| Monster                                                                                                                      | First Version                                        | Last Version                                 | Notes                                                                                                                                             |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| the [Three Stooges](/wiki/Three_Stooges "Three Stooges")                                                                     | [NetHack 2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")    | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")    |                                                                                                                                                   |
| the [mad scientist](/wiki/Mad_scientist "Mad scientist")                                                                     | [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0") | [3.0.6](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.6 "NetHack 3.0.6") |                                                                                                                                                   |
| [osquip](/wiki/Osquip "Osquip")                                                                                              | [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0") | [3.0.6](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.6 "NetHack 3.0.6") |                                                                                                                                                   |
| [unarmored soldier](/index.php?title=Unarmored_soldier\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Unarmored soldier (page does not exist)")    | [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0") | [3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3") | From [3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0"), occurs only if MUSE is turned off (which is not the default)                                   |
| [unarmored watchman](/index.php?title=Unarmored_watchman\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Unarmored watchman (page does not exist)") | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3") | Occurs only if MUSE is turned off (which is not the default)                                                                                      |
| [Earendil](/wiki/Earendil "Earendil")                                                                                        | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3") | Male Elf [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") leader                                                                                                      |
| [Elwing](/wiki/Earendil#Elwing "Earendil")                                                                                   | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3") | Female Elf [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") leader                                                                                                    |
| High-elf                                                                                                                     | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3") | Elf [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") friendly                                                                                                         |
| the Goblin King                                                                                                              | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3") | Elf [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") nemesis                                                                                                          |
| the Wizard of Balance                                                                                                        | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.3.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.1 "NetHack 3.3.1") | [Wizard](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") leader; replaced by [Neferet the Green](/wiki/Neferet_the_Green "Neferet the Green") |

## List of defunct objects

| Item                                                                                                                                                                                        | First Version                                        | Last Version                                    | Notes                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [agate stone](/wiki/Agate_stone "Agate stone")                                                                                                                                              | [Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")                | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       | reappears in [NetHack 3.3.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.0 "NetHack 3.3.0")                                                                                                                              |
| [pair of gloves](/wiki/Pair_of_gloves "Pair of gloves")                                                                                                                                     | [Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")                | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       | mostly equivalent to the [leather gloves](/wiki/Leather_gloves "Leather gloves")                                                                                                               |
| [scroll of damage weapon](/index.php?title=Scroll_of_damage_weapon\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Scroll of damage weapon (page does not exist)")                                                 | [Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")                | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       | similar to modern [cursed](/wiki/Cursed "Cursed") [scroll of enchant weapon](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_weapon "Scroll of enchant weapon")                                                        |
| [shield](/index.php?title=Shield_\(defunct_object\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Shield (defunct object) (page does not exist)")                                                                | [Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")                | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       | [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") is 1, rustable; superseded by [small shield](/wiki/Small_shield "Small shield")                                                                                            |
| [tourmaline](/index.php?title=Tourmaline\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Tourmaline (page does not exist)") and [onyx](/index.php?title=Onyx\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Onyx (page does not exist)") | [Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")                | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       | Black onyx exists in later versions                                                                                                                                                            |
| [dead lizard](/wiki/Dead_lizard "Dead lizard")                                                                                                                                              | [Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")                | [3.0.5](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.5 "NetHack 3.0.5")    | superseded by [lizard](/wiki/Lizard "Lizard") [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                                                                  |
| [elfin chain mail](/wiki/Elfin_chain_mail "Elfin chain mail")                                                                                                                               | [NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")    | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       | mostly equivalent to the [elven mithril-coat](/wiki/Elven_mithril-coat "Elven mithril-coat")                                                                                                   |
| [slice of pizza](/index.php?title=Slice_of_pizza\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Slice of pizza (page does not exist)")                                                                            | [NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")    | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       | superseded by nameable [fruit](/wiki/Fruit "Fruit"); appears in [3.0.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.1 "NetHack 3.0.1") through [3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3") if TUTTI\_FRUTTI is disabled |
| [spellbook of genocide](/wiki/Spellbook_of_genocide "Spellbook of genocide")                                                                                                                | [NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")    | [3.0.10](/wiki/3.0.10 "3.0.10")                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [badge](/index.php?title=Badge\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Badge (page does not exist)")                                                                                                       | [NetHack 2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")    | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")       |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Thunderfist](/wiki/Thunderfist "Thunderfist")                                                                                                                                              | [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0") | [3.0.2](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.2 "NetHack 3.0.2")    | superseded by [Mjollnir](/wiki/Mjollnir "Mjollnir")                                                                                                                                            |
| Shaped [keys](/wiki/Key "Key")                                                                                                                                                              | [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0") | [3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10") |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [The Palantir of Westernesse](/wiki/The_Palantir_of_Westernesse "The Palantir of Westernesse")                                                                                              | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3")    | Elf [Quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact")                                                                                                                                    |

## Other defunct features

| Item                                             | First Version                                        | Last Version                                            | Notes                                                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Hell](/wiki/Hell "Hell")                        | [Hack 1.0.2](/wiki/Hack_1.0.2 "Hack 1.0.2")          | [3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10")         | superseded by [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom")                                                                             |
| [Endgame](/wiki/Endgame_\(3.0\) "Endgame (3.0)") | [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0") | [NetHack 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10") | superseded by the [Elemental](/wiki/Elemental_Planes "Elemental Planes") and [Astral Planes](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane") |
| [Ninja](/wiki/Ninja "Ninja") role                | [NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")    | [2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")               | superseded by [Rogue](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue") role                                                                                 |
| Elf role                                         | [NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")    | [3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3")            | superseded by [Ranger](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") role and [Elf](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") race            |
| Names for lighting store shopkeeper              | [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0") | [3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3")            | superseded by [Izchak](/wiki/Izchak "Izchak")                                                                                   |

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Defunct_features\&action=edit)*

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"There may be many more defunct objects not listed here."*

## Variants

### SLASH'EM

- *Main article: [Defunct features (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Defunct_features_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Defunct features (SLASH'EM)")*

Over its history as a variant of vanilla *NetHack*, [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") has gone through many features that were long since removed.

### SpliceHack

- *Main article: [Defunct features (SpliceHack)](/wiki/Defunct_features_\(SpliceHack\) "Defunct features (SpliceHack)")*

[SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") removed many features during the rewrite for version 1.0.0.

### SLASHTHEM

- *Main article: [Deferred and defunct features (SlashTHEM)](/wiki/Deferred_and_defunct_features_\(SlashTHEM\) "Deferred and defunct features (SlashTHEM)")*

[SLASHTHEM](/wiki/SLASHTHEM "SLASHTHEM") removed many features between v.0.8.0 and 0.9.4.

## See also

- [Deferred features](/wiki/Deferred_features "Deferred features"): Features, for which the code is available but that have not been implemented yet.
- [Game history](/wiki/Game_history "Game history")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Defunct features

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Over the years, NetHack has added many features, but also removed some. These defunct features are listed below.

Contents

  • 1 List of defunct monsters
  • 2 List of defunct objects
  • 3 Other defunct features
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 SLASH'EM
    • 4.2 SpliceHack
    • 4.3 SLASHTHEM
  • 5 See also

List of defunct monsters

Monster First Version Last Version Notes
the Three Stooges NetHack 2.3e 2.3e
the mad scientist NetHack 3.0.0 3.0.6
osquip NetHack 3.0.0 3.0.6
unarmored soldier NetHack 3.0.0 3.1.3 From 3.1.0, occurs only if MUSE is turned off (which is not the default)
unarmored watchman NetHack 3.1.0 3.1.3 Occurs only if MUSE is turned off (which is not the default)
Earendil NetHack 3.1.0 3.2.3 Male Elf Quest leader
Elwing NetHack 3.1.0 3.2.3 Female Elf Quest leader
High-elf NetHack 3.1.0 3.2.3 Elf Quest friendly
the Goblin King NetHack 3.1.0 3.2.3 Elf Quest nemesis
the Wizard of Balance NetHack 3.1.0 3.3.1 Wizard Quest leader; replaced by Neferet the Green

List of defunct objects

Item First Version Last Version Notes
agate stone Hack 1.0 2.3e reappears in NetHack 3.3.0
pair of gloves Hack 1.0 2.3e mostly equivalent to the leather gloves
scroll of damage weapon Hack 1.0 2.3e similar to modern cursed scroll of enchant weapon
shield Hack 1.0 2.3e AC is 1, rustable; superseded by small shield
tourmaline and onyx Hack 1.0 2.3e Black onyx exists in later versions
dead lizard Hack 1.0 3.0.5 superseded by lizard corpse
elfin chain mail NetHack 1.3d 2.3e mostly equivalent to the elven mithril-coat
slice of pizza NetHack 1.3d 2.3e superseded by nameable fruit; appears in 3.0.1 through 3.1.3 if TUTTI_FRUTTI is disabled
spellbook of genocide NetHack 1.3d 3.0.10
badge NetHack 2.3e 2.3e
Thunderfist NetHack 3.0.0 3.0.2 superseded by Mjollnir
Shaped keys NetHack 3.0.0 3.0.10
The Palantir of Westernesse NetHack 3.1.0 3.2.3 Elf Quest artifact

Other defunct features

Item First Version Last Version Notes
Hell Hack 1.0.2 3.0.10 superseded by Gehennom
Endgame NetHack 3.0.0 NetHack 3.0.10 superseded by the Elemental and Astral Planes
Ninja role NetHack 1.3d 2.3e superseded by Rogue role
Elf role NetHack 1.3d 3.2.3 superseded by Ranger role and Elf race
Names for lighting store shopkeeper NetHack 3.1.0 3.1.3 superseded by Izchak
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"There may be many more defunct objects not listed here."

Variants

SLASH'EM

Main article: Defunct features (SLASH'EM)

Over its history as a variant of vanilla NetHack, SLASH'EM has gone through many features that were long since removed.

SpliceHack

Main article: Defunct features (SpliceHack)

SpliceHack removed many features during the rewrite for version 1.0.0.

SLASHTHEM

Main article: Deferred and defunct features (SlashTHEM)

SLASHTHEM removed many features between v.0.8.0 and 0.9.4.

See also

  • Deferred features: Features, for which the code is available but that have not been implemented yet.
  • Game history

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Defunct_features&oldid=170998"

rawPage:
Over the years, NetHack has added many features, but also removed some. These '''defunct features''' are listed below.

==List of defunct monsters==

{| class="wikitable"
!Monster !! First Version !! Last Version !! Notes
|-
|the [[Three Stooges]] || [[NetHack 2.3e]] || [[NetHack 2.3e|2.3e]] ||
|-
|the [[mad scientist]] || [[NetHack 3.0.0]] || [[NetHack 3.0.6|3.0.6]] ||
|-
|[[osquip]] || [[NetHack 3.0.0]] || [[NetHack 3.0.6|3.0.6]] ||
|-
|[[unarmored soldier]] || [[NetHack 3.0.0]] || [[NetHack 3.1.3|3.1.3]] || From [[NetHack 3.1.0|3.1.0]], occurs only if MUSE is turned off (which is not the default)
|-
|[[unarmored watchman]] || [[NetHack 3.1.0]] || [[NetHack 3.1.3|3.1.3]] || Occurs only if MUSE is turned off (which is not the default)
|-
|[[Earendil]] || [[NetHack 3.1.0]] || [[NetHack 3.2.3|3.2.3]] || Male Elf [[Quest]] leader
|-
|[[Earendil#Elwing|Elwing]] || [[NetHack 3.1.0]] || [[NetHack 3.2.3|3.2.3]] || Female Elf [[Quest]] leader
|-
|High-elf || [[NetHack 3.1.0]] || [[NetHack 3.2.3|3.2.3]] || Elf [[Quest]] friendly
|-
|the Goblin King || [[NetHack 3.1.0]] || [[NetHack 3.2.3|3.2.3]] || Elf [[Quest]] nemesis
|-
|the Wizard of Balance || [[NetHack 3.1.0]] || [[NetHack 3.3.1|3.3.1]] || [[Wizard]] [[Quest]] leader; replaced by [[Neferet the Green]]
|}

|-

|-

==Variants==

{{main|Defunct features (SLASH'EM)}}
Over its history as a variant of vanilla ''NetHack'', [[SLASH'EM]] has gone through many features that were long since removed.

{{main|Defunct features (SpliceHack)}}

===SLASHTHEM===
{{main|Deferred and defunct features (SlashTHEM)}}

[[SLASHTHEM]] removed many features between v.0.8.0 and 0.9.4.
